sentences.en: Frugal , maybe -- self - controlled , for sure -- but not frivolous.
sentences.cn: 可能会节俭, 自制 是一定的,但决不会轻浮.

sentences.en: He is so frivolous, he never takes anything seriously.
sentences.cn: 他太随意了, 从不认真对待任何事情.

sentences.en: He spent a lot of his money on frivolous things.
sentences.cn: 他在一些无聊的事上花了好多钱.

sentences.en: His criticisms were always captious and frivolous, never offering constructive suggestions.
sentences.cn: 他的评论一向轻率并爱吹毛求疵, 从不提出有建设性的建议.

sentences.en: I just decided I was a bit too frivolous to be a doctor.
sentences.cn: 我刚刚决定说自己有点过于轻率，不适合做医生。

sentences.en: If I could intrude a note of seriousness into this frivolous conversation.
sentences.cn: 我真想说一句,叫他们谈话放严肃些.

sentences.en: Inclination in that direction has long been considered frivolous and unmanly.
sentences.cn: 这方面的爱好长期被认为是轻薄和非男子气的.

sentences.en: It was frivolous of him to make such an accusation.
sentences.cn: 他提出这样的指控真无聊.

sentences.en: Library Case Study of Administrative Law: Can Modem User Be More Frivolous?
sentences.cn: 图书馆行政法个案: 魔电族真能魔高一丈 吗 ?

sentences.en: She has a frivolous nature and won't take anything seriously.
sentences.cn: 她生性轻浮,什么事情都不肯认真对待.

sentences.en: She laughed and was frivolous and rather brittle.
sentences.cn: 她哈哈大笑,说话态度轻佻,不过还显得相当脆弱.

sentences.en: That is not a frivolous answer, but a serious one.
sentences.cn: 这不是轻率的而是严肃的回答.

sentences.en: The court discourages frivolous law suits.
We should not idle away our time, and drift in frivolous thoughts.
sentences.cn: 人生在世,不能无所事事, 蒙懵懂懂而虚度一生.

sentences.en: Who'd be fool enough to buy such a frivolous dress?
sentences.cn: 谁会愚蠢到买这样一件轻佻的衣服 呢 ?

trans.tran_cn: 无价值的，毫无意义的，轻率的，轻易，不务正业的，孩子气的
trans.tran_en: If you describe someone as frivolous, you mean they behave in a silly or light-hearted way, rather than being serious and sensible
